display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
display_target_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, Disorient effects, and Fire, Cold, Energy and Negative Energy damage, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_target_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, Immobilize, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative), Self -DEF
display_attacker_hit: You now resist Damage, Knockback and Disorientation with your {PowerName}, but your Defense is reduced.
